name: BUMPERS & BROADSWORDS: TOURNAMENT
description:
BUMPERS & BROADSWORDS: TOURNAMENT is a Yu-Gi-Oh!-style tournament-based RPG - explore the city, collect roughly 60 different types of Warriors/Magicians/Beasts/Machines/Etc... to slam against each other and win the Championship! Each Bumper has its own special effect, so choosing 4 that have a powerful synergy is vital.

FEATURES:

  • A modern city environment to explore more and more as you make progress
  • Over 60 unique Bumpers with varied stats and special effects
  • Cute Gameboy Color aesthetics
  • In-battle AI that will try to capitalise on the effects of its Bumpers and make smart plays
  • 'Humour' and anime references

CONTROLS:

  • Z Key / A Button: Interact / Confirm / Hold and release to launch Bumper
  • X Key / B Button: Cancel
  • ESC / Start Button: Bumper configuration
  • Arrow Keys / D-Pad: Move / Scroll / Adjust launch direction
